EmailTemplate.subject: eWeekly – Get the Latest Aloha Status Updates
EmailTemplate.textOnly: February 4, 2021 Get the Latest Aloha Status Updates All channel partners should encourage your customers to sign-up today for access to the Aloha Status Page for immediate access to information about the health and performance of our software, 24 x 7 x 365. It’s so easy to subscribe <[[https://status.aloha.ncr.com/]]> and only takes a few minutes to set preferences and instantly start to receive automated updates, via text, email or RSS feed with information about: - Upcoming software changes and notifications - Current incident status information - Previous solution incident reports - Maintenance reports Check out the new Aloha Status Page <[[https://status.aloha.ncr.com/]]> today! New and Improved NCR Customer Support We’re excited that our new customer-centric teams for Aloha/Hosted support program successfully launched this week. Customers are already experiencing a difference. Please remember to share information with your customers about the improvements we’ve made to our Customer Support model and ensure they have the correct numbers to call for support. Read more. <[[https://ncr.quickbase.com/up/bqe6gx23b/g/rcm/ek/va/Customer Support Comms Enterprise for Channel Newsletter 1-27-21.pdf]]> Webinar: The Loyalty Iceberg: Creating Human-Centered Experiences We know how busy you are. In case you missed this informative webinar, we’ve got you covered. We recorded it, so you can watch it at your convenience, to learn everything it takes to create enduring customer relationships. We’ve compiled proven techniques you can master so your customers choose you over the competition again and again. Check out the recording: The Loyalty Iceberg: Creating Human-Centered Experiences <[[https://urldefense.com/v3/__https:/msp6.bigmarker.com/links/-FKOjiiEi2X/N9pJfPvyi/vGIW4tok-7/ijpR5rkFO?redirect_to=https*3A*2F*2Fwww.bigmarker.com*2Fwinsight*2FThe-Loyalty-Iceberg-Creating-Human-Centered-Experiences*3Fbmid*3D82c032089f22__;JSUlJSUlJQ!!In4Qlw!_KX_-m0aNAmLKMXBys1lpcRk6e8gYklTeU04VcS4lFRL9XHJ_jxSX2IAHyAQb2kVL0s$]]>.
